title: The Empire Strikes Back
creator_credit: Irvin Kershner, Richard Edlund, Ralph McQuarrie, Lucasfilm Ltd., 20th Century Fox, George Lucas, Gary Kurtz, Rick McCallum, Howard G. Kazanjian, Norman Reynolds, Leigh Brackett, John Mollo and Lawrence Kasdan
brief_description: The epic saga continues as Luke Skywalker, in hopes of defeating the evil Galactic Empire, learns the ways of the Jedi from aging master Yoda. But Darth Vader is more determined than ever to capture Luke. Meanwhile, rebel leader Princess Leia, cocky Han Solo, Chewbacca, and droids C-3PO and R2-D2 are thrown into various stages of capture, betrayal and despair.

constellations_other.name: Shadow play
constellations_other.description: Shadow play uses light and projection to tell stories â€“ fundamentals that would evolve into cinematography. In the Wayang tradition, gunungan open and close performances and indicate scene changes and the puppets pass across the projection screen in a similar way to a wipe transition.
